questions.questionText: Which of the following is the original purpose of SQL?
questions.explanation: interfaces are typically used to list the properties and methods for an object

questions.questionText: Which of the following is the original purpose of SQL?

options.text: To specify the syntax and semantics of SQL data definition language
To specify the syntax and semantics of SQL manipulation language

questions.explanation: number[] is another way of writing Array<number> in TypeScript

questions.questionText: The wildcard in a WHERE clause is useful when?

options.text: An exact match is necessary in a SELECT statement.
An exact match is not possible in a SELECT statement.
An exact match is necessary in a CREATE statement.
An exact match is not possible in a CREATE statement.

questions.explanation: a constructor is used by a class to take in parameters

questions.questionText: A view is which of the following?

options.text: A virtual table that can be accessed via SQL commands
A virtual table that cannot be accessed via SQL commands
A base table that can be accessed via SQL commands
A base table that cannot be accessed via SQL commands

questions.explanation: async is not used as an access modifier type in TypeScript

questions.explanation: the export keyword allows for the information to be transmitted between files

questions.questionText: ON UPDATE CASCADE ensures which of the following?
questions.explanation: filter is a method used to conditionally create a new array

questions.questionText: SQL data definition commands make up a(n) ________ .
